description: This file contains Row Level Security (RLS) policies, policies for table access control, triggers for validation, and helper functions related to access and validation for a game's backend database.

methods.name: validate_user_sensitive_fields
methods.description: Trigger function to prevent decreasing total_ep and respect_level in users table.

methods.name: validate_notification_updates
methods.description: Trigger function to ensure notifications are only marked as read, not modified otherwise.

methods.name: user_owns_zone
methods.description: Helper function to check if a user owns a specific zone.

methods.name: zone_is_attackable
methods.description: Helper function to determine if a zone can be attacked by a user.

methods.name: is_authenticated
methods.description: Helper function to verify if the current user is authenticated.
